attributes.action: Ban the use of the phrase "We're all in this together"
attributes.additional_details: I’m fed up to the back teeth with our politicians using the phrase “We’re all in this together”. We’re not are we. All front bench politicians have very good terms and conditions, a finally salary pension and a good annual income. Now they are driving through the worst cuts to the standard of living in  a generation, but they are retaining their perks. It is patronising for them to keep on using this phrase and it should be punishable by a fine.
